about_the_game:
Arm yourself with the Shards of Vulcan Pack.

Pack includes:

  • 1800 Platinum

  • Magmatic Armaments Bundle containing five weapon skin cosmetics:

    • Obsidian Bardiche two-handed polearm

    • Obsidian Shard totem

    • Obsidian Reaper two-handed scythe

    • Obsidian Crossbow two-handed Crossbow

    • Obsidian Prong two-handed Sorcerer staff

Magmatic Armaments:

Carved from the densest of volcanic glass, these elements are of unearthly sharpness and enchantment given.

Platinum can be exchanged to customize your in-game experience with purchasable cosmetic items from the Shop, used to unlock access to the premium Battle Pass, and Battle Pass Tier Skips.
